item.description:
Let's meet at this whimsical outdoor playspace and explore nature while socializing with new friends. Children can imagine themselves as little birds tucked safely in their nest in the bluebird house garden, leap frog over the collection of petrified wood or marvel at the butterflies that have their own special garden. Climb the magical tree house for a bird's eye view of the spiraling paths and koi pond. A large sand play area is filled with shovels and toys.

For directions visit : http://www.masshort.org/Weezie-s-Garden-for-Children
item.name: Kids AM Activity:Weezie's Garden at the Elm Bank
